title: RRSP Basics
description: Save for retirement and pay less tax today.

content.title: The Tax Break
content.text: Money put into a Registered Retirement Savings Plan (RRSP) is deducted from your taxable income. This often results in a tax refund, but you will pay tax when you withdraw the money in retirement.

quiz.question: What is the main benefit of contributing to an RRSP?
options: It reduces the income tax you pay this year
It gives you a free credit card
It is only for buying a car
quiz.explanation: RRSP contributions reduce your taxable income, which can lower your overall tax bill.
